entries.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.
We learned that functions are a component of Javascript that we use to do things with our data.
We went over if else statements and how to use them to within functions and iterations to manipulate our data.

We have been learning how we can use array methods like .find and .filter to perform tasks that we would otherwise have to use a forof loop to accomplish the same thing. These are proving to be very useful tools in the toolkit when navigating through your data to display certain things!
